definition: see 林陰大道|林阴大道[lin2 yin1 da4 dao4]
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: Chocolate shops are numerous (and top-notch) along the grand boulevards and piazzas.
sentences.chinese: 巧克力商店不計其數的分佈在林蔭大道和廣場中。

sentences.english: BARBARA KLEIN: The Workshop is on a quiet tree-filled street in Washington, D.
sentences.chinese: 這個作坊位於華盛頓特區一個安靜的林蔭大道上。

sentences.english: The ride their will be relaxed and social meandering through a mix of shaded streets and quiet hutongs.
sentences.chinese: 騎行將會很輕鬆，穿過林蔭大道和安靜的衚衕。

sentences.english: On the boulevard he noticed that the pistol had no trigger.
sentences.chinese: 走到林蔭大道上，他發現那手槍沒有撞針。

sentences.english: A greenway circumnavigates the island, buffering views.
sentences.chinese: 一條林蔭大道環繞着該島。

sentences.english: The famous Bodhi Tree Street, is Europe's most famous boulevard.
sentences.chinese: 著名的菩提樹街，是歐洲最著名的林蔭大道。

sentences.english: West of the Brandenburg Gate, the boulevard runs through Tiergarten.
sentences.chinese: 在勃蘭登堡門西面，林蔭大道穿過蒂爾加藤公園。

definition: Tuku town in Yunlin county 雲林縣|云林县[Yun2 lin2 xian4], Taiwan
(of an area) to have trees with shade-giving foliage/(of a road) to be tree-lined
Xincheng District of Xi'an 西安市[Xi1 an1 Shi4], Shaanxi/Xincheng District of Hohhot City 呼和浩特市[Hu1 he2 hao4 te4 Shi4], Inner Mongolia
green grass like cushion (idiom); green meadow so inviting to sleep on
